entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
